import { useState, useRef } from 'react' import { Center, Heading, Box, Drawer, DrawerOverlay, DrawerBody, DrawerContent, SimpleGrid, useDisclosure, DrawerHeader, IconButton, Icon, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { HamburgerIcon, AddIcon, ChevronDownIcon, ChevronRightIcon, } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import { AiOutlinePlusCircle } from 'react-icons/ai' export default function NavBar() { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure() const inputFile = useRef(null) const onAddClock = () => { inputFile.current?.click(); } return ( <> } bg='red.400' color='white' onClick={onOpen}/> DigiCloset Menu

Closet

OOTD

 } onClick={() => onAddClock}/> ) }
